module.name: functional_decomposition_to_interconnect_design
module.name.french: Décomposition fonctionnelle pour conception de connexion
module.keywords: module, electrical, layered product, analysis, simulation, packaging application, interconnect

abstract.p: the representation of the information needed to describe the assignment of a functional unit in a network definition to specific elements in the interconnect substrate design. This module defines the different means of performing swapping within a design. The types of swapping covered are the ones between gates in a single printed part, between identical gates in different instances of a printed part, and between terminals of identical type and behaviour in a gate.
abstract.li: allocation of a functional unit in a hierarchical network definition to a transmition line in the interconnect design;
allocation of a functional unit in a hierarchical network definition to a fabrication joint line in the interconnect design.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the assignment of a functional unit in a network definition to fabrication joints and transmission lines in the interconnect substrate design. This module defines the different means of performing swapping within a design. The types of swapping covered are the ones between gates in a single printed part, between identical gates in different instances of a printed part, and between terminals of identical type and behaviour in a gate.

inscope.li: allocation of a functional unit in a hierarchical network definition to a transmition line in the interconnect design;
allocation of a functional unit in a hierarchical network definition to a fabrication joint line in the interconnect design;
items within the scope of application module Fabrication joint, ISO/TS 10303-1668;
items within the scope of application module Functional decomposition to design, ISO/TS 10303-1676.

ae.refpath: {product_definition_relationship product_definition_relationship.id = 'design functional unit allocation to fabrication joint'}

aa.refpath: product_definition_relationship product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition -> product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition characterized_product_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition => product_definition_shape <- shape_aspect.of_shape shape_aspect => component_feature_joint => fabrication_joint
